item.title: Athena and Macie
item.author: Author
item.description: Athena What is Athena Athena is a interactive query service which enables you to analyse and query data located in S3 using standard SQL. Serverless, nothing to provision, pay per query / per TB scanned No need to set up complex Extract/Transform/Load(ETL) process Works directly with data stored in S3 Athena Use Case What can Athena be used for? Query log files stored in S3: e.g. ELB logs, S3 access logs etc Generate business reports on data stored in S3 Analyse AWS cost nad usage reports Run queries on click-stream data Macie What is PII(Personally Identifiable Information)?
